Bosc MR

For two years I worked with a variety of doctors in Seattle and Canada to design and build medical visualization software. At Pyrus we focused on VR software for perioperative education and AR-based navigation for percutaneous procedures.

Summary of achievements:

  • Created business plan and prototype to secure initial grant
  • Designed and built front-end of web application
  • Designed and built interface elements in Unity (Canvas)
  • Concepted & designed ‘Touch Motion’
  • Designed and built HoloLens web controller
  • Shadowed and interviewed doctors: synthesized needs and constraints
  • Ongoing usability testing
